resources.string: App will notify you when new post is published. App is checking for new posts once a week on background, or when opened.

Dev Blog for Android is unofficial open-source app for keeping in touch with Android dev blog. App is using jet-article project (which is now under development) to load posts and show it natively using Jetpack Compose.
App is checking for new posts every 2 days, or when opened. You can turn on notifications to get notified.
Enjoy latest news from world of Android development in fully adaptive way ðŸ˜Š
Loading posts and post detail ðŸ“–
Checking for new posts every two days on background using WorkManager
